1.0.name: wordpress/add-twitter-search-widget
1.0.description:
Tweeter Search Widget. Plugin shows your tweets on Page/Post/Widget area.

This plugin shows your twitter search tweets under Sidebar Area (Widget), Post and/or Pages. Tweets will REFRESH AUTOMATICALLY. Also it has reply option inside widget on mouse over action. Admin panel option available under Settings -> Twitter Search Widget to set different color combination and twitter widget options.

Screenshots on official pages: http://new-wordpress.us/wp-twitter-search-widget-7/

Features

Tags: twitter, twit, tweet, tweets, twitter widget, dynamic twitter widget, auto refresh tweet, sidebar twitter, twitter sidebar, twitter, twitter post, twitter tools, best twitter, Original Tweet , Twitter Tweet Button, WP Tweet Button, Twitter Button, WP Tweet
